Pk: 0
Id: QV1
Text: interviewer: unsuccessful calls – reasons for substitution
VariableLabel: Unsuccessful visit – HH1
Language: English
List_PkSurvey: 6
PkVariable: 
Source: SAB
Note: Answered by interviewer, after instructions, Select a household according to the walk pattern (i.e. fifth house on the right). If there is no one at home in the selected household on thee first try, make at least one more trip to the household before substituting. If there is no one at home after a second call, substitute that household with the next household found in the direction of the walk pattern.

Pk: 263
Id: Q14
Text: a.  in discussions about politics with friends and neighbors, i can influence the opinions of others?  b.  as far as politics are concerned, friends and neighbors do not listen to me?
VariableLabel: Influence others vs no influence
Language: English
List_PkSurvey: 3,6
PkVariable: 
Source: Zambia96
Note: The enumerator introduced the question by saying, I am now going to give you several pairs of statements.  Please listen to both, then tell me which one you agree with most.  Choose Statement A or Statement B.  Enumerator then probed, Do you agree strongly or just somewhat?

Pk: 0
Id: Q28
